title: Steel kiteshield (Horse)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A steel kiteshield is a decorative kiteshield with the symbol of the mythical 'horse'. Players can paint them on a painting stand in a player-owned house's Workshop at level 43 Crafting with a Steel kiteshield and the appropriate crest from Sir Renitee in the White Knights' Castle.

Steel kiteshield

Advanced data
Item ID8760

A steel kiteshield is a decorative kiteshield with the symbol of the mythical 'horse'. Players can paint them on a painting stand in a player-owned house's Workshop at level 43 Crafting with a Steel kiteshield and the appropriate crest from Sir Renitee in the White Knights' Castle.

Players must have a toy horsey in their inventory in order to have their crest symbolised as a horse. Players can use a Painting Stand in another player's house if they do not have one in theirs.

If a player is killed by another player, the shield will convert into a steel kiteshield if it is not protected upon death.

[[File:Steel kiteshield (Horse) detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''steel kiteshield''' is a decorative kiteshield with the symbol of the mythical 'horse'. Players can paint them on a painting stand in a [[player-owned house]]'s [[Workshop]] at level 43 [[Crafting]] with a [[Steel kiteshield]] and the appropriate crest from [[Sir Renitee]] in the [[White Knights' Castle]].

Players must have a [[toy horsey]] in their inventory in order to have their crest symbolised as a horse. Players can use a Painting Stand in another player's house if they do not have one in theirs.

If a player is killed by [[Player killing|another player]], the shield will convert into a steel kiteshield if it is not protected upon death.
